name: Apothekitty
description:
Play as Penny Cea, a cat running her own potion shop.

Customers come up with different ailments that need to be cured, and Penny has the means to do it! Check the recipe book and mix together different ingredients to get the customer what they need. 

Move with arrow keys, Interact with ingredients and customers by pressing the Space bar. After the cauldron has 2 ingredients, press Space to mix and you'll have the potion to bring to the counter.

Made for the 2019 Game Jam from Feb 2nd - Feb 16th and will be updated as we continue to develop.

The Team:

Coding: Myself and EcoGames (Reprevise)

Art: BurlyBurly and Gray

Music: Piper (Floofsh)
